name: conference-website-vercel
description: Full-stack conference website for Vercel deployment

scripts.start: echo 'This project is intended for Vercel deployment.'
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --jsx=automatic --platform=browser --target=es2020 --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' && cp index.html dist/index.html && sed -i 's|<script type="module" src="/index.tsx"></script>|<script src="/bundle.js"></script>|' dist/index.html && sed -i '/<script type="importmap">/,/<\/script>/d' dist/index.html
